level.heading: DEADLINE FOR FILING BIENNIAL REPORT (ยง 17-703)

level.text: For any domestic or foreign entity that registered with the Superintendent between January 1 and December 31 of the current calendar year, the biennial report shall be filed with the Superintendent by April 1 of the next calendar year.
A domestic or foreign entity that files a biennial report under ยง 703.1 shall file subsequent biennial reports every two (2) years following the first April 1 filing.

For any registered domestic or registered foreign entity that previously was not required to file a biennial report with the Superintendent, the biennial report shall be filed with the Superintendent by April 1, 2013.
A domestic or foreign entity that files a biennial report under ยง 703.3 shall file subsequent biennial reports every two (2) years following the first April 1 filing.

For any registered domestic or registered foreign entity general cooperative or cooperative association that has filed an annual report with the Superintendent, the biennial report shall be filed with the Superintendent by April 1, 2013.
A domestic or foreign entity that files a biennial report under ยง 703.5 shall file subsequent biennial reports every two (2) years following the first April 1 filing.
